issue.title: Refactor Parquet Code Samples to use Result<T> APIs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7352](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7352). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the Parquet code samples use the (now deprecated by ARROW-7235) `Status`-returning functions.

A PR will be opened shortly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7352?focusedCommentId=16991637) by Gal Lushi (gallushi):*
Opened in ARROW JIRA instead of PARQUET JIRA.
see continued work in PARQUET-1713
